name: Fallen From Virtue
description:
A short RPG Maker game I made for class.

Follow Zadkiel, a fallen angel seeking redemption, as he wanders through a depraved city ruled by the Seven Deadly Sins. It's a cute and fun game about morality, and it's full of lovable characters to encounter!

Thanks to Yanfly for various plugins, petschko on deviantart for the angel wings and halo assets, and my teacher Mr. Griffin for inspiring this game's creation.
